sqlMap.select: SELECT k.memberUnq, k.auctionUnq, k.lCtg, k.mCtg, k.sDate, k.eDate, k.aucTitle, k.sPrice, k.deliveryWay, k.deliveryFee, k.sellerName, k.sellerPhone, k.aucDetail, k.delStatus, a.bidUnq, a.auctionUnq, a.memberUnq, a.bidPrice, a.bidRdate, a.aucStatus FROM kobayAuction k LEFT OUTER JOIN auctionBid a ON k.auctionUnq = a.auctionUnq AND k.sDate = to_char(k.sDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND k.eDate = to_char(k.eDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE a.bidPrice = (SELECT max(bidPrice) FROM auctionBid WHERE auctionUnq = a.auctionUnq ) AND a.auctionUnq = #auctionUnq#

SELECT qnaUnq, memberUnq, auctionUnq, qnaGroup, qnaStep, questionerUnq, TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(qnaContent,0,3999)) qnaContent, qnaSecret, delStatus, qnaRdate FROM auctionQna WHERE auctionUnq = #auctionUnq# ORDER BY qnaGroup DESC, qnaRdate ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO auctionQna ( qnaUnq, memberUnq, auctionUnq, qnaGroup, qnaStep, questionerUnq, qnaContent, qnaSecret, delStatus, qnaRdate ) VALUES ( question_seq.nextval, #memberUnq#, #auctionUnq#, question_seq.currval, #qnaStep#, #questionerUnq#, #qnaContent#, #qnaSecret#, #delStatus#, sysdate )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE auctionQna SET delStatus=#delStatus# WHERE qnaUnq=#qnaUnq#
